/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their green leaves contrasting with the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
